channel.title: Weeknotes on Will-Ellwood.com
channel.description: Recent content in Weeknotes on Will-Ellwood.com

item.title: Week 35, 2018
item.description: Everything is awful. Our planet and societies are facing numerous ecological collapses inflicted by humanity. There’s no escape in the face of post-capitalism flattening all cultural consumption into a desert of mega-franchises. All we can do is record our activities and perceptions in the desperate hope of being able to reconstruct the a place outside of what Alexei Yurchak called “HyperNormalisation”. This is my attempt for week 35, 2018.
